name: Thanh Phat Phong Nha
address: Phong Nha - Kẻ Bàng, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Thanh Phat Phong Nha ở Phong Nha cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 1 sao có khu vườn và nhà hàng. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Tại khách sạn, tất cả các phòng có điều hòa, bàn làm việc, TV màn hình phẳng, phòng tắm riêng, ga trải giường, khăn tắm và sân hiên với view núi. Các căn có tủ quần áo.

Khách sạn này có dịch vụ thuê xe đạp và dịch vụ thuê ô tô. Ngoài ra, đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách Thanh Phat Phong Nha 38 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The staff were so lovely and helpful, couldn’t have asked for nicer people.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Everything! very friendly and helpful staff ( the owner is fantastic, she really cares about her hosts!). the position is really good if you arrive with the sleeper bus and the bedrooms is large and clean. There are also several nice restaurants and coffee bars near the hotel. You can book the sleeper bus/train and the tour at the reception of the hotel.

review.rating: best place to stay in phong Nha
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: ms van was very helpful during our stay, she gave us information on the caves and she helped us with booking transport to our next destination. we hired a ped as well. the rooms were clean and comfy. right next to the bus stop as well so in a very convenient location :)

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Clean and spacious room, very friendly and accommodative staff. Good value for money.
review.comment_negative: Beds were a bit hard and uncomfortable.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Superior hospitality and assistance/support on emergencies and any other questions. Great location right next to the bus stop. Arranging transport isneasy with the hotel owners. They give you bettwe price and more options than online bookings.

review.rating: Nice room, good service, convenient location
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Lovely staff. Will go out of their way to help you. Had our washing done at a reasonable price. Also, rent a motorbike at a good price. very good breakfast, especially the banana cake. The room was clean and had a good tv. Lovely terrace and balcony. Great location close to bars and cafes. All buses stop right at the door, very convenient for commuting

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive: I got a nice experience in this brand new hotel .We room is super comfy with wide view balcony . The staff is gentle and helpful.

review.rating: Room rates are cheap compared to the room and service. Encourage everyone !
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
We arrived at 4 am on a night bus, The bus stops right at this homestay.
Ms. Van woke up early especially to let us in and she found a room for us to sleep for a few hours. Service above and beyond and a genuine homestay, the family are delightful. The rooms are spectacular. I could recommend more. Thank you so much

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The room we got was great. The room has a very nice mountain view. Great location for pick up and drop off at the hotel and 5 minute's walk from Phong Nha cave. We were guided by our host Van to schedule a tour for 2 exciting days of caving. Everything here is very good at a reasonable price. Would love to come back here again <3

review.rating: 2 days with 1 night. Good price & facilities even it was old style hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Location was very convenience
